concept.title: Running the html5 plugin
concept.shortdesc: The html5 plugin simply add the html5 transtype to the DITA-OT

conbody.p: In order to run the plugin, you must be familiar with the process of running the DITA-OT. Please refer to the documentation.

section.title: Running DITA-OT from Ant
section.p: Execute the usual command using html5 as the transtype
